Recap: Hope and Wyatt stroll through Paris. They sit on a bench with the Eiffel Tower in background. He tells her these are truly icons, her and the Eiffel Tower and they are going to truly take Paris by storm. She looks over her shoulder and says yes it is a trip they will never forget. He seems to sense what she is thinking and asks if she really thinks Liam is going to show. Liam is at Spencer's and Alison hands him his first class tickets on commercial since the Spencer jet is out of the country. Pam surprises Ivy by saying it is here  her work permit to stay in the states. She can now go to Paris. Aly tells Oliver that Paris would have been fun but she is okay; she'd rather be there with him. She says besides Rick and Hope are in Paris and her dad and Taylor are on vacation so somebody has to be in charge around here. Oliver says then he is dating the boss and he kind of likes that. He says the showing will be live streaming so it will be sort of like they are in Paris only they aren't. There is a lot riding on this photo shoot. The whole world is watching. Felicia verifies to Rick that the shoot is on lockdown, everything is set. So now they just need Hope and Wyatt. Right on cue, they stroll in. Hope introduces Felicia to Wyatt who says he is happy to see her again. They are unbelievably excited about tomorrow and Wyatt just hopes there are no distractions. Liam calls Ivy and says he just wanted her to know that he is taking her advice and will be flying to Paris. She's happy; says she wishes she were going but her work permit just came through a little too late. He says no; he is heading to LAX right now so he can get Alison to get her a ticket too. She says he can fax her the details and she will meet him at the airport. Quinn calls Wyatt to see how the day is going. He says not that well. Hope invited Liam to meet her there. He's not here yet. She says he just gave Hope the diamond so Wyatt can't lose the girl and the rock too. He says forget what he just said and whatever she does, just stay away from Liam. He wants to be clear on that. Quinn smiles and says yes loud and clear. When Hope asks, Wyatt fibs and says it was only someone from his warehouse and he did not want to deal with it right now. Hope thanks Felicia for filling in for Thorne and pulling this together so fast. Wyatt says the diamond has been magic in the past and it will again in Paris. There is no telling what kind of magic it is capable of.

Pam helps Ivy pack. Although she is not going, Aly is delighted to hear that Ivy is going and meeting Liam and that he is going to be with Hope in Paris. They say goodbye and the last thing Aly tells Ivy is to make sure Liam gets to Hope. As Liam drives off from the parking lot, Quinn is hiding behind another car close by. She is disguised all in black with sunshades and a scarf around her head. Aly gushes to Oliver about how dreamy it is that Liam is going to Paris. Oliver says he likes Liam but he is not lucky in the good luck department. It is always one thing or the other with him. Aly tells him to bite his tongue. Nothing bad is going to happen in Paris. She has a lot of faith in them and she is going to plan a party for them when they get back. Felicia brings up Ricardo and why he left the diamond to Wyatt who is not a relative. Hope jumps in and says Ricardo knew how much Wyatt appreciated the diamond. Felicia also asks if Quinn had known Ricardo for long ..so Wyatt might say his mother was instrumental in him getting the diamond. She doesn't want to make Wyatt uncomfortable but she asks where his mother is now. She heard she attacked Liam. Again Hope jumps in and says Quinn went through a really bad time but she is seeking help and they are all glad she has taken that step. Oliver has Aly close her eyes and he guides her to a seat where he has displayed a gorgeous romantic French dinner ..since they could not go to Paris he brought it here. He says Liam is not the only romantic one. She says he will always be her knight in shining armor. Liam boards first but is waiting for Ivy who soon joins. Both are bubbling over about this trip. Just behind them is Quinn in her disguise reading a magazine. Ivy tells Liam that she thinks he is making the right decision. He laments yeah once he got over his huge ego, making this decision was easy. He says Hope has no idea he is coming. They have this special place and are to meet at 3 P. M. close to the Eiffel Tower. Hope has her ring and he has his and he plans to put it on her and they will be married in Paris. Quinn frowns at this. Hope and Wyatt stroll again along the Seine River. They are gushing about tomorrow but then he stops and tells her to do him a favor and not let Liam ruin this adventure for her. He always does. It's always complicated with him and always will be. If he doesn't show up then get out with her dignity still in tact. Just cut Liam loose. He scoffs that he has already given her the diamond and he doesn't want to take it back. She would never have to wonder where she stood with him. She means everything to him. He states that if Liam doesn't show up, he wants to make Hope his.
Transcript: Wyatt: Ah. The City of Light. The Hope for the Future diamond, the beautiful Hope Logan. Our photo shoot and this press conference is going to be a true meeting of the icons. I'm telling you, we're gonna take Paris by storm.
Hope: Well, there is no city as captivating and inspiring, so I agree. I think this will be a trip that we'll never forget.
Wyatt: Mm-hmm.
Hope: [Sighs]
Wyatt: Do you really think Liam's gonna show?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Liam: Hey. Plane's all set?
Alison: Spencer jet's out of the country, so I booked you first class on the next flight out.
Liam: Great. Thank you. Thank you.
Alison: Per your request, a car will be waiting for you at the airport to take you directly to your destination.
Liam: Yeah, I'm actually -- I'm meeting Hope right after the photo shoot. She doesn't even know for sure that I'm coming, so --
Alison: Aww. Well, I'm sure she'll be very pleasantly surprised.
Liam: Yeah. Well.
Alison: Travel safe, Liam, and call me if you need anything.
Liam: Thank you so much, Alison. [Sighs]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Pam: Ivy! Ivy, you are not gonna believe this.
Ivy: Pam, what's wrong?
Pam: It came!
Ivy: What?
Pam: Your work permit. The attorneys just sent it.
Ivy: Let me see that!
Pam: You know what this means, right? You can go to Paris.
Ivy: [Laughs]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Oliver: So, are you bummed you're not going?

Aly: It would have been fun. [Sighs] But I'd much rather be here with you. Besides, everyone's gone. Wyatt, Hope, and Uncle Rick are probably in Paris by now, and my dad's on a trip with Taylor, so somebody's got to be in charge around here. [Smiles]
Oliver: So, I am dating the boss is what you're saying.
Aly: As a matter of fact, yes, you are. How does it feel?
Oliver: I kind of like it.
Aly: [Chuckles]
Oliver: Kind of like everything about you.
Aly: What about you? You're really not disappointed they hired another photographer for the shoot?
Oliver: No. I am just glad to be involved. You know, I'm happy to have a job.
Aly: Me, too. Even if I'm not really the boss. [Laughs]
Oliver: Well, you know, the press conference is gonna be live streaming, so it's basically like you and I are in Paris.
Aly: Mm.
Oliver: Only we're not.
Aly: [Laughs] I wonder if Liam decided to go meet Hope. He'd be making a huge mistake if he doesn't.
Oliver: We've got a lot riding on this photo shoot. The whole world will be watching.
Aly: [Sighs]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Rick: So, location on lock down?
Felicia: It's all ours.
Rick: Security, catering?
Felicia: We will have more than enough.
Rick: You are amazing, Felicia. I knew I could count on you.
Felicia: Where is Hope and Wyatt, anyway?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Hope: Here we are. Hi.
Felicia: Hi.
Hope: I'm so sorry we're late. We took a little detour. Felicia, you remember Wyatt. Wyatt, Felicia.
Wyatt: Yeah. Nice to see you again. Hi.
Felicia: Hi. Big day tomorrow.
Wyatt: Yeah. Yeah. We are unbelievably excited. Just hope we don't have any distractions. Yeah. [Clears throat]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Liam: Hey. It's Liam.
Ivy: Hi.
Liam: I just want to let you know I'm taking your advice. I'm flying to Paris to meet Hope.
Ivy: Oh, good! I'm really happy for you. That's great news.
Liam: Yeah. Thank you. Thanks.
Ivy: Well, you know, I wish I was going. My work permit just came through. A little too late.
Liam: Well, no. Why don't you come? I'm headed to LAX right now.
Ivy: What, really?
Liam: Yeah, I'll just get Alison to book you a ticket. We can fly together.
Ivy: Uh, yeah! Okay. Well, uh, how about you text me the details, and I'll met you at the airport.
[SCENE_BREAK]
[Truck beeping]
Quinn: Bonjour, mon chéri.
Wyatt: Hey. What's up?
Quinn: How's everything in Paris?
Wyatt: Could be better.
Quinn: What happened?
Wyatt: Well, hope invited Liam to meet her after the photo shoot.
Quinn: He's not coming, is he?
Wyatt: Well, he didn't give her a clear answer, but she's hoping that he'll show.
Quinn: [Sighs] You just gave hope the diamond. You can't lose the girl and the rock, too.
Wyatt: You know what? I shouldn't have told you. Forget I said anything. And please just whatever you do, you stay away from Liam. Are we clear?
Quinn: Loud and clear.
Wyatt: Good.
[Cell phone beeps]
[SCENE_BREAK]
Felicia: My big brother sure did pick a great time to go on vacation.
Rick: Yeah, tell me about it. Thorne and Taylor are off the grid in some exotic locay.
Hope: They are getting pretty serious, huh?
Felicia: It certainly seems that way.
Wyatt: Sorry about that.
Hope: Who was that?
Wyatt: It was just somebody from the warehouse. I didn't want to deal with it right now.
Rick: Felicia says that the trocadéro gardens are all set.
Wyatt: Really? [Laughing] No one shoots there unless -- unless you do it illegally.
Rick: Unless you're Forrester Creations. [Chuckles]
Hope: It's wonderful. It's brilliant. I think it's such a good idea. The trocadéro gardens are stunning.
Rick: With the Eiffel tower over in the background.
Wyatt: Well, that's convenient. You'll only have to take a few short steps to go --
Hope: I think it's great. I'm really excited about it. Seriously, Felicia, I know the shoot came up really quickly. Thank you for stepping in for Thorne and making this all happen.
Felicia: Of course.
Rick: Well, hope and the diamond have already created so much international buzz.

Wyatt: Exactly. I'm telling you, it's that diamond. And the woman wearing it, of course. But that stone is powerful. It's brought us plenty of good fortune so far in the past, and it will again. In Paris. I mean, the most vibrant, passionate city in the world. There's no telling what kind of magic that it's capable of.
Pam: Okay! So, how about this one?
Ivy: Ooh, yeah.
Pam: Yeah?
Ivy: Thanks.
Pam: Yes, this one.
Ivy: Yes, that definitely.
Pam: Okay. And then...
Ivy: Eh.
Pam: No? I mean, it gets pretty chilly in Paris at night. I just --
Ivy: Yeah, I don't know if I'll need it.
Pam: Actually, I crocheted this myself. You know, with my own two little fingers. But, no, if you don't like it, I totally get it.
Ivy: No, Pam, I love it. I love it. I would be honored to wear it.
Pam: Really?
Ivy: Yes.
Pam: Awesome. Got clothes, shoes. Do you have your passport?
Ivy: Yes, in my purse.
Pam: Okay. I put a few lemon bars in the side pocket, you know, for a special little treat.
Ivy: Aw, thank you. Well, I better get going or I'm gonna miss this flight.
Aly: Your flight? Where are you off to?
Pam: Ivy's work permit came in. She is going to Paris with Liam.
Aly: With Liam?
Ivy: Yeah.
Aly: He's going to meet hope?
Ivy: I'm meeting him at the airport.
Aly: Oh, my gosh. I'm so happy.
Ivy: [Laughs] I know. I really wish you were coming.

Aly: Me too, but I'm so excited for you, Ivy. I know how much you wanted to be at the photo shoot. And what this means for Liam and hope -- I am so happy that he came through, and I'm so proud of him that he's going.
Ivy: Yeah, I know. It's so romantic.
Pam: Yeah, well, we better get going or you're gonna miss that plane, missy.
Ivy: Okay, well, uh, look. I'll talk to you when I get there.
Aly: Okay, you have the best time, and whatever you do, make sure Liam gets there in time to meet hope.
Ivy: Yes. All right, I'll see you soon.
Aly: Bye. Have a safe flight. [Sighs]
[Cell phone rings]

Liam: This is Liam. Yeah, I'm actually headed to Paris right now. I know. I know. We're just gonna have to set up that meeting for next week. Okay. Yeah, I -- yeah, thanks for understanding. Okay. You too. Thank you for understanding. Okay, thanks. Bye.
Aly: Guess what? Liam is going to Paris!
Oliver: Oh! Great.
Aly: How can you not even be the slightest bit excited? It's so romantic. Liam hopping on a plane, flying all the way to Paris to get the girl. So dreamy it hurts.
Oliver: If he makes it.
Aly: Why would you say that?
Oliver: I like Liam. I do. But that guy -- he just hasn't gotten any luck lately. If it's not one thing, it's --
Aly: What could possibly go wrong? Quinn is locked away somewhere and Steffy is totally out of the picture.
Oliver: Steffy lives in Paris.
Aly: She's not an issue anymore, Oliver.
Oliver: All right, well, what could go wrong? Nothing.
Aly: Nothing.
Oliver: Except a late flight, bad weather, Parisian traffic.
Aly: Okay, bite your tongue. Nothing bad is going to happen in Paris. It's finally going to work out for hope and Liam.
Oliver: You and your happy endings. And what if it doesn't turn out that way?
Aly: Well, unlike some people, I have a lot of faith in hope and Liam, and I'm going to plan a party for them when they get back.
Felicia: So, Mr. Montemayor left you the diamond in his will?
Wyatt: Yeah. Surprised me just as much as everybody else.
Rick: I could imagine. I didn't realize you guys were so close.
Hope: Well, Ricardo didn't have any living relatives, and he knew how much the diamond meant to Wyatt.
Wyatt: And I always promised hope that I was gonna give it to her some day.
Felicia: Quite an extravagant gift.
Hope: Beyond.
Rick: So Quinn and Ricardo -- they've known each other for a long time.
Wyatt: Yeah. Long time. A few years.
Felicia: Oh. So you have your mother to thank for that diamond.
Wyatt: Yeah. What do you mean?
Rick: I think what she's saying is that you would never have the diamond if Quinn hadn't introduced you to Ricardo.
Wyatt: Yeah, right. Yeah. That's very true. Yeah.
Felicia: Where is your mother these days? I don't mean to make you feel uncomfortable or anything, but I heard rumors that she attacked Liam?
Hope: You know, Quinn went through a really difficult time, and now she's getting the help she needs. And we're all really happy that she's taking that step. Can I get you anything, monsieur?

Liam: Uh, no, thank you. One more glance outside the window you're feeling helpless, I can tell I don't have an answer for everything over and under and in between, but, oh, I know you like I know myself and I can't help but thinking, well, look at us you can see we're no superheroes, but I'd save you if you could save me from all this gravity I'm all right I believe I'll be flying in no time hang on tight it's just you and me and all this gravity, yeah it's all this gravity
Ivy: Hi.
Liam: Ivy! Oh, my God! You made it.
Ivy: Yeah, I know. Not a moment to spare.
Liam: Yeah.
Ivy: Whew! Can't believe I actually made it.

Liam: Yeah, like, way to rally last minute. I'm super impressed. Ladies and gentlemen, the captain has turned on the "fasten seatbelt" sign. If you will please have a seat and make sure your seatbelt is securely fastened.
Ivy: Hey.
Liam: Not kidding. Like, really last minute, right?
Ivy: I know.
Liam: Wow.
Ivy: Hey. Thank you so much for making this all happen. I'm so excited! We're actually going to Paris!
Liam: I know. It's happening.
Ivy: It's gonna be so memorable, this trip, I can just feel it.
Liam: I think you're right.
Aly: What's going on?
Oliver: All right. Stop. Open.
Aly: [Gasps] Oh, my gosh.
Oliver: Since we couldn't go to France, I brought it to you.
Aly: Oh, my gosh, Oliver. [Chuckles] What a nice surprise.
Oliver: [French accent] For mademoiselle, we have Portobello mushroom with béarnaise sauce and, your favorite, white truffle pommes frites.
Aly: You are too good to me.
Oliver: Yeah. Liam is not the only romantic guy around here. And I do have to admit the Eiffel tower is tough to beat.
Aly: Nothing could ever top what you did in the jousting ring.
Oliver: I was pretty good.
Aly: [Chuckles]
[Cheers and applause]
[Fanfare]
Aly: That is a moment I will never forget. It was so chivalrous. A lost art nowadays.
Oliver: I had to prove to you how much you mean to me.
Aly: You know, you looked pretty handsome as a knight.
Oliver: Well, I'm pretty tight with those guys now. I can probably get them to let me borrow the costume.
Aly: You don't need it. You will always be my knight in shining armor. Just like Liam is hope's knight in shining armor.
Oliver: How did I know you were gonna say that?
Aly: [Laughs]
Liam: To Paris.
Ivy: Yes, and to making good decisions.
Liam: Ooh. I'll drink to that.
Ivy: [Chuckles]
Liam: Thank you so much for the wise counsel, by the way.
Ivy: No, look, I think you're making the right decision, Liam. It's obvious how much you love hope.
Liam: Once I got over myself and my huge ego, that decision became pretty -- pretty easy. Thing is, I don't want to lose hope. If I don't show up, that's exactly what's gonna happen, so...
Ivy: Well, it's a good thing you're on this plane, then.
Liam: Yeah.
Ivy: So, tell me.
Liam: Yeah?
Ivy: Does hope know that you're on your way?

Liam: I'm surprising her. No, she has no idea whether I'm coming or not. There's this special place we have. It's near the Eiffel tower, so I'm supposed to meet her there at 3:00 P.M. Sharp. She's gonna be wearing her ring, and I will put on mine. And here's the coup de grâce. Are you ready? I plan on marrying her in Paris.
Hope: Look at the trocadéro gardens. And this fountain -- everything about this place is stunning.

Wyatt: Mm-hmm. And just think about tomorrow. All right? You up on stage, looking gorgeous as ever. The diamond just blinding everyone in the sunlight. And the reporters all here to see you and that diamond.
Hope: Yeah, I think it's gonna be a success.
Wyatt: Mm-hmm. Here it is. Le tour Eiffel.
Hope: She is magnificent.
Wyatt: [Laughs] An iconic landmark, an iconic diamond, an iconic woman. We'll make history. Okay, that diamond that has already been good to us I believe will change our lives again.
Hope: And I couldn't imagine a more special place.

Wyatt: Hope, can you do me a favor? Don't let Liam ruin this adventure for you. Look, all he does is make you upset. It's always so complicated with him, and it always will be. If he's not there, if he doesn't show up... get out with your dignity in tact. Cut him loose. Hell, I've already given you a diamond. I -- I don't want to take it back.
Hope: [Chuckling] Wyatt.
Wyatt: No, I'm just saying, you never, ever have to question where you stand with me.
Hope: [Chuckles]
Wyatt: Look, you mean everything to me. If he doesn't show up... I want to make you mine.
